name: SettiMize
author: SettiMize

sections.description:
SettiMize is a versatile WordPress plugin designed to enhance your WordPress admin experience by adding several useful features:

  • Word Count: Display word counts in the post and page list views.
  • Post Duplication: Easily duplicate posts and pages from the list view.
  • Featured Images: Display featured images in the post and page list views.

Acknowledgements

This plugin uses the WordPress framework and built-in functions. Special thanks to the WordPress development community.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. For more details, see the GNU General Public License.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the settimize folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the ‘SettiMize’ settings page under the ‘Settings’ menu to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
How do I enable or disable features?

Go to the ‘SettiMize’ settings page under the ‘Settings’ menu. From there, you can toggle the features On/Off according to your preference.

Can I customize the settings further?

The plugin settings are designed to be straightforward. If you need more advanced customization, please contact the plugin author.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release with word count, post duplication, and featured image features.
